    <facet>

      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>

            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/111257</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Pobarvaj po navodilih</string>
            <string language="en">Color following the instructions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Farbe nach den Anweisungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Couleur après les instructions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cor depois das instruções</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Colore dopo le istruzioni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρώμα μετά από τις οδηγίες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Color después de las instrucciones</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Pobarvaj podano črno belo sliko po navodilih, da dobiš končno podobo.</string>
            <string language="en">Color the given black and white picture by following the instructions in order to get final image.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">slika</string>
            <string language="en">image</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">navodilo</string>
            <string language="en">instruction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">pobarvanka</string>
            <string language="en">coloring book</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Färben Sie die gegebene schwarze und weiße 
Abbildung durch nach die Anweisungen, um abschließendes Bild zu 
erhalten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Colorez l'image noire et blanche donnée par 
après les instructions afin d'obtenir l'image finale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Colora o retrato preto e branco dado depois das 
instruções a fim começar a imagem final.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Colori la data immagine nera e bianca tramite 
dopo le istruzioni per ottenere l'immagine finale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρωματίστε τη δεδομένη μαύρη και άσπρη εικόνα με την 
ακολουθία των οδηγιών προκειμένου να αποκτηθεί η τελική εικόνα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Coloree el cuadro negro y blanco dado por 
después de las instrucciones para conseguir imagen final.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bild</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anweisung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Farbtonbuch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">image</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">instruction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">livre de coloration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">imagem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">instrução</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">livro da coloração</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">immagine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">istruzione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">libro di coloring</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εικόνα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οδηγία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χρωματίζοντας βιβλίο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">imagen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">instrucción</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">libro del colorante</string>
          </keyword>
